page.title: 15ANNUAL EVENTS IN MOFFAT
page.content: GALA WEEK: These celebrations are in early July each year.Its origins are associated with the long standing industry of the area,sheep farming.As a symbol of this fact,each year a Shepherd and his Lass are installed,but this is a week for everyone to enjoy and partake in.There are knock-out competitions;Decorated pram races;Road races;Decorated vehicles;Childrens fancy-dress parade;Dances and a Torchlight Procession. MOFFAT SHOW: The Moffat Show Society holds an annual show the last Saturday in August each year and the visitors can enjoy and admire the skills of the local people and their crafts,and also veiw prize-winning sheep,cattle and horses.Home industries exhibits and floral art displays are a few of the other attractions of the show.
